results.message: Page detected as HTML, but does not have a lang attribute.
The page is missing a the WAI-ARIA MAIN landmark or a link to skip directly to the main page content as the first link on each page.
Orphan content found that does not reside within a WAI-ARIA landmark or labelled region role.

WCAG20_Html_HasLang.0: Page must identify the default language of the document with a lang attribute
WCAG20_Html_HasLang.Fail_3: Page detected as HTML, but does not have a lang attribute.

RPT_Html_SkipNav.0: Provide a mechanism to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple Web pages.

WCAG20_Doc_HasTitle.0: The page should have a title that correctly identifies the subject of the page.

HAAC_BackgroundImg_HasTextOrTitle.0: Verify that important background image information is conveyed when the system is in high contrast mode.

RPT_List_UseMarkup.0: Use proper HTML LIST elements to create lists.

RPT_Text_SensoryReference.0: Usage of sensory words must be meaningful to users who may not have sensory perception of size, sound, shape, or location.

WCAG20_Text_LetterSpacing.0: Use CSS 'letter-spacing' to control spacing within a word.

RPT_Blockquote_WrapsTextQuote.0: Quotations should be marked with Q or BLOCKQUOTE elements.

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA_PV.0: Contrast of foreground and background must be sufficient to meet WCAG AA requirements.

HAAC_Aria_Native_Host_Sematics.0: The WAI-ARIA role(s) and/or attribute(s) must be valid for the relevant element.

Rpt_Aria_OrphanedContent_Native_Host_Sem.0: All content must reside within a HTML5 Sectioning element, WAI-ARIA landmark or labelled region role.
Rpt_Aria_OrphanedContent_Native_Host_Sem.Fail_1: Orphan content found that does not reside within a WAI-ARIA landmark or labelled region role.

RPT_Title_Valid.0: Provide a descriptive TITLE for Web pages.

WCAG20_Body_FirstASkips_Native_Host_Sema.0: The page must provide a link to skip directly to the main page content as the first link on each page or use WAI-ARIA landmarks.
WCAG20_Body_FirstASkips_Native_Host_Sema.Fail_1: The page is missing a the WAI-ARIA MAIN landmark or a link to skip directly to the main page content as the first link on each page.

RPT_Header_HasContent.0: Provide descriptive headings for Web page sections.

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA.0: Contrast of foreground and background must be sufficient to meet WCAG AA requirements.

RPT_Headers_FewWords.0: Make sure HEADER elements are used as a heading for a section and not used to format text for presentation.

WCAG20_Img_HasAlt.0: Images must have an alt attribute, and must be the empty string if decorative.

RPT_Img_AltCommonMisuse.0: Ensure that image alt text serves as an inline replacement of the image.
